circumstances: On approach to Hickam AFB, the airplane was attacked by the pilot of a Japanese fighter. Bullets hit the aircraft and its cargo. Several explosions occurred, and upon touchdown, the bomber went out of control and veered off runway, coming to rest broken in two and bursting into flames. A crew member was killed and seven others were injured.
probable_cause: Shot down. Bullets hit the cargo which was composed of magnesium that ignited and caused several explosions on final approach.
